name: eprocurement technologies pvt ltd
description: tender and procurement and online auctio
overview:
e-Procurement Technologies Pvt. Ltd. (ETPL) is India’s only ISO 27001 Certified, end-to-end eProcurement Solution Provider. That’s precisely the reason why Fortune 500 Companies like State Bank of India (SBI), ICICI Bank, Bharat Heavy Electricals Limited (BHEL), Reliance Group, Bank of Baroda, & 10,000’s of Government & Private Customers have selected us over hordes of other eProcurement Solution Providers. Our eProcurement offerings are divided into following two business streams namely;

  • eProcurement Solutions & Services
  • Listing Services

.Our eProcurement Offering (abcProcure.com) includes the following;

* Reverse Auction Application
* Forward Auction Application
* eTendering Application
* eSourcing Application
* Team Buying Application
* RFQ, RFI, RFP Applications

Our Listing Services (TenderTiger.com) includes the following;

* Global Tender Portal
* Indian Project Portal
* Indian Catalogue Portal
* Market Making Services
* OneTender, The Daily Tender Magazine
